title: What should be the sample letter for writing an internship letter? - Quora

response.answer_text: Better sa DRAFT letter instead of sample letter. A draft is, say, rough copy/communique which may later b suitably corrected to suit the desired by the writer. Now U may make needy corrections yourself to the draft placed below- making additions &/or deletions deem fit - fo submission: Sir, I should feel lavishly obliged if u please favourably consider my candidature (detailed in the Annexure) for an Internship in your esteemed organisation. Thanking u in anticipation, I remain Sir.
